name: Testing encrypt_this function
description:
Testing encrypt_this function [with text='Why can we not all be like that wise old bird', expected='87yh 99na 119e 110to 97ll 98e 108eki 116tah 119esi 111dl 98dri'].

        :param self:
        :return:
descriptionHtml:
Codewars badge:

Test Description:

Your message is a string containing space separated words.
You need to encrypt each word in the message using the following rules:
* The first letter needs to be converted to its ASCII code.
* The second letter needs to be switched with the last letter
Keepin' it simple: There are no special characters in input.

steps.name: Enter test string: Why can we not all be like that wise old bird and verify the output: 87yh 99na 119e 110to 97ll 98e 108eki 116tah 119esi 111dl 98dri.
